title: Canadian Animation PDA Pack
description:
*******************************************************************************
                           Canadian Animation PDA Pack
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 A pack of my current favourite animations by the National Film Board of Canada
and the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation. Some are ripped from DVD, others
are re-encoded from old NTSC VHS rips.
 I've also included "Very Nice, Very Nice" by Arthur Lipsett; not really
animation in the same vein as the rest of the material, but interesting
none-the-less. Google the name if you need an art fix, he's kinda kewl.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Quick Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Animation
Platform.............: PDA
Audio Format.........: 128Kbps CBR MP3 stereo
Video Format.........: 300Kbps 2-pass Xvid
Resolution...........: 320 x 240

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                  File List
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
National Film Board of Canada:
  From the Big Bang to Tuesday Morning
  Oh Sure
  Ryan
  The Apprentice
  The Big Snit
  The Great Toy Robbery
  The Irises
  Very Nice, Very Nice
  Vignettes Reel 01 - Faces
  Vignettes Reel 01 - Land Bridge
  Vignettes Reel 01 - Newfoundland
  Vignettes Reel 01 - Voyageurs
  When the Day Breaks

Radio Canada / Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
  The Man Who Planted Trees
  The Mighty River

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Where to Buy the DVD/VHS Material
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- <a href="
http://www.nfb.ca/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.nfb.ca/</a> <a href="
http://www.cbcshop.ca/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.cbcshop.ca/</a>

*******************************************************************************
                           Canadian Animation PDA Pack
*******************************************************************************
